resource.name: Building Permit Applications - Main Street Districts
resource.description:
Data set of Building Permit Applications submitted to the City of Orlando that fall within a Mainstreet District - All Application Types and Statuses.  Data activity from 10/1/2013 - Update date.  Refreshed weekly.

Mainstreet Districts include: 

Audubon Park Garden District
Church Street Parramore Zone
City District
College Park
Curry Ford West
Gateway Orlando
Ivanhoe Village
The Milk District
Mills 50
SoDo
Thornton Park District
West Lakes

Please note that the number and scope of Main Street Districts has changed over time and there may be variances between historical and present day definitions or boundaries.


Disclaimer: This data is derived from the Economic Development Platform, we acknowledge there is always the possibility of mechanical or human error. The City of Orlando does not guarantee the accuracy of the information. The City of Orlando will not be responsible for any error or omission, or for the use of, or the results obtained from the use of this information. All data visualizations on maps should be considered approximate and attempts to derive specific addresses are strictly prohibited. Additionally, because City policy and operations regarding reporting might change, the data may have limited value for comparisons over time.
columns_description: Type of Permit Application.  Most common types are BLD (Building), ELE (Electrical), MEC (Mechanical), PLM (Plumbing), ENG (Engineering), FIR (Fire)
Date the Application was processed by the City of Orlando
Project Name
Application Number
Application Status
Square Footage for Project
Project Comments
Certificate of Occupancy Date
Expire Date of Permit
Date the Permit was Finalized (Work is completed)
Date the Permit was Issued (Work can begin)
Related to Address Contact of Primary Applicant
Y = Permit was Issued in the last 6 months
Y = COO was created in the last 6 months
Y = COC was created in the last 6 months
Y = Application was created in the last 6 months
Provides the Neighborhood where the project is occurring (if applicable)
Name of the Primary Applicant
Email Contact of Primary Applicant
Phone Contact of Primary Applicant
Related to Address Contact of Primary Applicant
Role or Capacity of the Applicant in relation to the project
Related to Address Contact of Primary Applicant
Related to Address Contact of Primary Applicant

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Orlando Neighborhoods' (gsfg-ku74) the point in column 'georef' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Orlando Commissioner Districts' (bgqw-styj) the point in column 'georef' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Orlando Main Street Program Area' (u8wz-9eai) the point in column 'georef' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
Provides the Mainstreet District where the project is occurring
Development of Regional Impact Area
Commissioner Name
Additional Location information
Code that indicates the type of work covered by the permit
Describes the processing stage of the application
Owner's estimated value of the project
C = Commercial, R1 = Single Family Residential, R3 = Multi Family Residential
Cert of Completion Date
Sewer Benefit Fee file code
Community Redevelopment Area
Related to Address Contact of Primary Applicant
Minimum Parking Spaces Required
Indicates if Onsite Parking is provided
Commissioner District Number
Parcel ID for the Address.  If many parcel IDs exist at this address, this field will be blank.
Address Situs
GPS X Reference: Projected Coordinate System = NAD_1983_StatePlane_Florida_East_FIPS_0901_Feet
GPS Y Reference: Projected Coordinate System = NAD_1983_StatePlane_Florida_East_FIPS_0901_Feet

If the permit is the result of an originating (parent) permit, this column provides the Application # of the Originating or Parent permit #.  A Parent permit application can have many related "child" applications and they may be different application types.
Milestone, or processing stage, of the Parent Application (if applicable)
Y = This is an Originating (Parent) Permit Application that has related (Child) Permit Applications.

resource.name: Permit Applications
resource.description: Permit Applications received and processed into the economic development information system. Applications are updated daily.

resource.name: Short Term Rental Licenses
resource.description:
This data set of Short Term Rental Licenses (STRs) represents all Short-Term Property Rental permit requests submitted to the City of Orlando in the last 5 years.  Please refer to the City of Orlando’s requirements on Home Sharing Registration for additional details about this type of license.

Disclaimer: This data is derived from the Economic Development Platform, we acknowledge there is always the possibility of mechanical or human error. The City of Orlando does not guarantee the accuracy of the information. The City of Orlando will not be responsible for any error or omission, or for the use of, or the results obtained from the use of this information. All data visualizations on maps should be considered approximate and attempts to derive specific addresses are strictly prohibited. Additionally, because City policy and operations regarding reporting might change, the data may have limited value for comparisons over time.
columns_description: Additional details about property to be used for Short Term Rental
City of the property owner
Contact information for the license applicant
Contact information for the license applicant
Date license will expire
Name of License Applicant
Zip code of the property owner
Date license was issued
Date of application for the license
Last date that an action occurred on this license.  Some actions may be system generated and do not result in changes to license details.
Country of the property owner
Address of the property owner
Name of the property owner
Date license became inactive
Last date that a modification occurred on this record.  Some modifications may be system generated and do not result in changes to license details.
Date by which the license should be renewed to remain valid
Property that applicant has requested to use for Short Term Rental
License's current stage in the Application process
Current status of the license
State of the property owner
Address of the property owner
Name of the property owner

resource.name: Planning Applications/Approvals - Last 5 Years
resource.description:
NOTICE: This data set is no longer receiving updates and will be retired effective 10/15/2023.  Please use the new data set 'Planning Applications', which is updated daily.

Data set of all Planning Applications submitted to or Approved by the City of Orlando in the last 5 years (rolling), or that were updated in the last 5 years.  

Disclaimer: This data is derived from the Economic Development Platform, we acknowledge there is always the possibility of mechanical or human error. The City of Orlando does not guarantee the accuracy of the information. The City of Orlando will not be responsible for any error or omission, or for the use of, or the results obtained from the use of this information. All data visualizations on maps should be considered approximate and attempts to derive specific addresses are strictly prohibited. Additionally, because City policy and operations regarding reporting might change, the data may have limited value for comparisons over time.
columns_description: Name of the primary applicant on the Planning application
Date the Planning Application was processed by the City of Orlando
Date of application approval
Application case number assigned to the Planning project
Application Type Description - see attachment "City of Orlando Planning Application Types" under About this Dataset for complete listing.
Name of the Project on the Planning Application.  Depending on the application type, the project name may be the address of the project.
City of Orlando Commissioner District
GPSX
Mainstreet District of the project location (if applicable)
Parcel ID of the Project Address
GPSY
Comments included on the Planning application to provide additional detail
Project Address
Neighborhood of the project location (if applicable)

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Orlando Main Street Program Area' (u8wz-9eai) the point in column 'geocode' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Orlando Neighborhoods' (gsfg-ku74) the point in column 'geocode' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Orlando Commissioner Districts' (bgqw-styj) the point in column 'geocode' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
Community Redevelopment Area for the project location (if applicable)
City of Orlando Commissioner Name
Status of the Application as of the last run date

resource.name: USE Permit Applications - Right of Way, Sidewalk Cafe
resource.description: All Use permit applications processed by the City of Orlando in the last 5 years (rolling).  Includes Right of Way (ROW) and Sidewalk Cafe (SWC) permit applications.
columns_description: The address of the project.  May be missing/blank - use Location or Comments as alternative source
